title: Review: What Happens in the Theater Before and After the Dance?
description: Niall Jones’s “Compression” at Performance Space New York asks that you adjust to the absence of the expected and tune into a different wavelength.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:credit: Julieta Cervantes for The New York Times
media:description: The choreographer and performer Niall Jones in his solo show “Compression.”
